snippet.title: Les Murray dies aged 71
snippet.content:
The world of Australian football is in mourning after the news that broadcasting legend and SBS presenter Les Murray has died aged 71.
SBS football broadcaster Les Murray has died at the age of 71 after a long battle with illness. Tributes tonight on SBS World News at 6.30pm
The country's most prominent presence on TV screens covering the sport, he was a passionate advocate for the game and a much loved figure both in sport and the media. More to come ... Originally published as
